rule.info: Windows应用信息事件。
rule.description: Windows application informational event.

rule.info: Windows应用警告事件。
rule.description: Windows application warning event.

rule.info: Windows应用错误事件。
rule.description: Windows application error event.

rule.info: Chrome 远程桌面尝试 - 拒绝访问 $(win.eventdata.data)。
rule.description: Chrome remote desktop attempt - access denied $(win.eventdata.data).

rule.info: Chrome 远程桌面尝试 - 客户端已连接 $(win.eventdata.data)。
rule.description: Chrome remote desktop attempt - Client connected $(win.eventdata.data).

rule.info: Chrome 远程桌面尝试 - 断开连接 ($(win.eventdata.data))。
rule.description: Chrome remote desktop attempt - disconnected ($(win.eventdata.data)).

rule.info: Chrome 远程桌面尝试 - 从 $(win.eventdata.data) 开始连接。
rule.description: Chrome remote desktop attempt - started connection from $(win.eventdata.data).

rule.info: 磁盘碎片整理程序成功完成分析。
rule.description: Disk defragmenter successfully completed an analysis.

rule.info: 报告签名的摘要事件。
rule.description: Summary event of the report's signatures.

rule.info: MsiInstaller 事件的分组。
rule.description: Group of MsiInstaller events.

rule.info: Windows 安装程序开始安装过程。
rule.description: Windows installer began an installation process.

rule.info: 应用程序卸载 $(win.eventdata.data)。
rule.description: Application uninstalled $(win.eventdata.data).

rule.info: 应用程序安装 $(win.eventdata.data)。
rule.description: Application installed $(win.eventdata.data).

rule.info: 产品组件请求失败。
rule.description: Request for product component failed.

rule.info: 键中的意外值或缺失值。
rule.description: Unexpected or missing value in key.

rule.info: 子项中的意外值或缺失值。
rule.description: Unexpected or missing value in subkey.

rule.info: Windows 安装程序重新启动以完成配置。
rule.description: Windows installer restarted to complete a configuration.

rule.info: 软件限制政策不允许安装。
rule.description: Installation not permitted by software restriction policy.

rule.info: 由于软件限制策略处理中的错误而不允许安装。
rule.description: Installation not permitted due to an error in software restriction policy processing.

rule.info: 此版本不支持 64 位软件包部署。
rule.description: 64-bit packages deployment is not supported for this version.

rule.info: Windows 安装程序代理信息未正确注册。
rule.description: Windows installer proxy information not correctly registered.

rule.info: MsiInstaller：无法连接到服务器。
rule.description: MsiInstaller: Failed to connect to server.

rule.info: 产品特征组件检测失败。
rule.description: Detection of product feature component failed.

rule.info: 无法安装应用程序。
rule.description: Application cannot be installed.

rule.info: 更新已成功移除。
rule.description: Update successfully removed.

rule.info: 无法删除更新。
rule.description: Update could not be removed.

rule.info: 更新安装成功。
rule.description: Update installed successfully.

rule.info: 无法安装更新。
rule.description: Update could not be installed.

rule.info: 另一个程序正在使用的文件。
rule.description: File in use by another program.

rule.info: 配置数据注册表项、子项或配置数据缓存文件夹未得到正确保护。
rule.description: The configuration data registry key, sub key or configuration data cache folder were not secured properly.

rule.info: 产品安装或更新需要重新启动才能使所有更改生效。
rule.description: The product installation or update required a restart for all changes to take effect.

rule.info: 应用程序尝试安装受保护 Windows 文件的更新版本。
rule.description: The application tried to install a more recent version of the protected Windows file.

rule.info: 装配组件正在使用中。
rule.description: Assembly component is in use.

rule.info: 安装期间更新的环境变量产生错误。
rule.description: Environment variables updated during installation generated an error.

rule.info: Windows 安装程序安装了产品。
rule.description: Windows installer installed the product.

rule.info: Windows 安装程序重新配置了产品。
rule.description: Windows installer reconfigured the product.

rule.info: Windows 安装程序安装了更新。
rule.description: Windows installer installed an update.

rule.info: Windows 安装程序删除了更新。
rule.description: Windows installer removed an update.

rule.info: Windows 安装程序需要重新启动系统。
rule.description: Windows installer requires a system restart.

rule.info: 程序从位置传感器或默认位置访问信息。
rule.description: A program accessed information from a location sensor or default location.

rule.info: SPP事件的分组。
rule.description: Group of SPP events.

rule.info: 软件保护服务停止。
rule.description: Software protection service stopped.

rule.info: 软件保护服务计划成功。
rule.description: Software protection service scheduled successfully.

rule.info: SLUI.exe 启动。
rule.description: SLUI.exe launched.

rule.info: 购买证明安装成功。
rule.description: Proof of purchase installed successfully.

rule.info: 现有调度程序数据与预期数据不匹配。
rule.description: The existing scheduler data does not match the expected data.

rule.info: 许可证激活 (slui.exe) 失败。
rule.description: License activation (slui.exe) failed.

rule.info: 应用程序停止响应，程序关闭。
rule.description: Application stopped responding, program closed.

rule.info: Windows 查询事件的分组。
rule.description: Group of Windows search events.

rule.info: 性能监控无法初始化。
rule.description: Performance monitoring cannot be initialized.

rule.info: 系统中加载的组件产生的内部错误。
rule.description: Internal error generated by a component loaded in the system.

rule.info: 无法开始更新，因为无法访问内容源。
rule.description: Cannot start update because the content sources cannot be accessed.

rule.info: 严重错误：系统资源不足。
rule.description: Critical Error: System low on resources.

rule.info: 建议状态更改失败：系统资源不足。
rule.description: Advise Status Change Failed: System low on resources.

rule.info: 注册表版本与预期版本不匹配。
rule.description: Registry version does not match with the expected one.

rule.info: 请求停止抓取。
rule.description: Crawl requested to be stopped.

rule.info: 申请入网账号无效。
rule.description: Application network access account invalid.

rule.info: 无法刷新收集器文件。
rule.description: Cannot flush gatherer files.

rule.info: 无法更新检查点记录。
rule.description: Cannot update checkpoint record.

rule.info: 无法保存收集器文件。
rule.description: Cannot save gatherer files.

rule.info: 无法从上一个检查点恢复收集器文件。
rule.description: Cannot restore gatherer files from the previous checkpoint.

rule.info: 无法读取检查点记录。
rule.description: Cannot read checkpoint record.

rule.info: 无法正常终止通知。
rule.description: Unable to terminate notifications normally.

rule.info: 目录位置无效。
rule.description: Directory location invalid.

rule.info: 磁盘已满，更新暂停。
rule.description: Disk full, update paused.

rule.info: 无法读取索引数据。
rule.description: Index data cannot be read.

rule.info: 缺少目录配置。
rule.description: Missing directory configuration.

rule.info: 无法读取注册表，缺少​​注册表项。
rule.description: Cannot read registry, registry keys missing.

rule.info: Windows 搜索服务已启动。
rule.description: The Windows search service started.

rule.info: Windows 搜索服务正常停止。
rule.description: The Windows search service stopped normally.

rule.info: 由于未加载计数器或无法打开共享内存对象，无法初始化性能监控。
rule.description: Performance monitoring cannot be initialized because the counters are not loaded or the shared memory object cannot be opened.

rule.info: Windows 搜索服务成功删除了旧的搜索索引。
rule.description: The Windows search service removed the old search index successfully.

rule.info: Windows 搜索服务试图删除旧的搜索索引。
rule.description: The Windows Search Service attempted to remove the old search index.

rule.info: 为响应用户配置文件删除成功删除了用户的 Windows 搜索服务索引数据。
rule.description: Windows Search Service indexed data for user successfully removed in response to user profile deletion.

rule.info: 为用户创建默认配置。
rule.description: Created default configuration for user.

rule.info: VSS事件的分组。
rule.description: Group of VSS events.

rule.info: 由于空闲超时，VSS 服务正在关闭。
rule.description: The VSS service is shutting down due to idle timeout.

rule.info: COM 服务器无法启动。
rule.description: COM server cannot be started.

rule.info: DeleteVolumeMountPoint 返回的意外错误。
rule.description: Unexpected error returned by DeleteVolumeMountPoint.

rule.info: 注册表用户名定义产生的错误。
rule.description: Error generated by registry user name definition.

rule.info: 无法解释注册表中指定的用户名。
rule.description: Cannot interpret user name specified in registry.

rule.info: 安全模式不支持卷影复制。
rule.description: Safe mode does not support shadow copy.

rule.info: EventSystem 服务被禁用或试图在安全模式下启动。
rule.description: The EventSystem service is disabled or attempting to start during safe mode.

rule.info: 卷影复制服务：COM+ 数据库损坏，写入者将不会收到事件。
rule.description: Volume Shadow Copy Service: COM+ database corrupted, writers will not receive events.

rule.info: COM+ 事件系统服务或 COM+ 系统应用程序服务已禁用。
rule.description: COM+ event system service or COM+ system application service disabled.

rule.info: 卷影复制服务已禁用。
rule.description: Volume shadow copy service disabled.

rule.info: Microsoft 软件卷影复制提供程序服务已禁用。
rule.description: Microsoft software shadow copy provider service disabled.

rule.info: 卷影复制 6 超时。
rule.description: Shadow copy 6 timeout.

rule.info: 找不到用于创建卷影副本的差异区域。
rule.description: Cannot find Diff area for creating shadow copies.

rule.info: 在 EventSystem 服务的内部处理期间检测到错误的返回代码。
rule.description: Bad return code detected during internal processing of the EventSystem service.

rule.info: 系统可能资源不足。
rule.description: System may be low on resources.

rule.info: EventLogs 调用的例程 BackupEventLogW 失败。
rule.description: Routine BackupEventLogW called by EventLogs failed.

rule.info: Sqllib 错误：数据库不简单。
rule.description: Sqllib error: Database not simple.

rule.info: SQL 卷影复制配置错误。
rule.description: SQL Shadow Copy configuration error.

rule.info: Sqllib 错误：无法创建 VDS 对象。
rule.description: Sqllib error: Failed to create VDS object.

rule.info: Sqllib 错误：调用 IDBInitialize 时遇到 OLEDB 错误。
rule.description: Sqllib error: OLEDB Error encountered calling IDBInitialize.

rule.info: VssAdmin：无法创建卷影副本。
rule.description: VssAdmin: Unable to create a shadow copy.

rule.info: 意外错误调用例程。
rule.description: Unexpected error calling routine.

rule.info: 查询 IVssWriterCallback 接口的意外错误。
rule.description: Unexpected error querying for the IVssWriterCallback interface.

rule.info: Writer 尝试在安全模式下订阅。
rule.description: Writer attempted to subscribe in safe mode.

rule.info: 卷影复制服务：写入者没有足够的权限来创建卷影副本。
rule.description: Volume Shadow Copy Service: Writers do not have enough privileges to create shadow copy.

rule.info: 集群服务不在具有足够访问权限的用户下运行。
rule.description: Cluster service does not run under a user with sufficient access rights.

rule.info: 由于空闲超时，VSS 服务正在关闭。
rule.description: The VSS service is shutting down due to idle timeout.

rule.info: 由于来自服务控制管理器的关闭事件，VSS 服务正在关闭。
rule.description: The VSS service is shutting down due to a shutdown event from the service control manager.

rule.info: OFO：无法删除目录。
rule.description: OFO: Directory can't be removed.

rule.info: 卷影复制服务警告：ESENT 错误。
rule.description: Volume Shadow Copy Service Warning: ESENT ERROR.

rule.info: 创建或使用 COM+ Writers 发布者界面时出错。
rule.description: Error creating or using the COM+ Writers publisher interface.

rule.info: 使用 CLSID 创建卷影副本提供程序 COM 类时出错。
rule.description: Error creating the shadow copy provider COM class with CLSID.

rule.info: 在卷影副本提供程序上调用例程时出错。
rule.description: Error calling a routine on a shadow copy provider.

rule.info: 系统可能资源不足。
rule.description: System may be low on resources.

rule.info: Writer 没有响应 GatherWriterStatus 调用。
rule.description: Writer did not respond to a GatherWriterStatus call.

rule.info: 在尝试联系卷影复制服务编写者时检测到内部不一致。
rule.description: Internal inconsistency detected in trying to contact shadow copy service writers.

rule.info: 卷/磁盘未连接或未找到。
rule.description: Volume/disk not connected or not found.

rule.info: 无法提交卷影副本。
rule.description: Could not commit shadow copy.

rule.info: VSS 被拒绝访问根目录。
rule.description: VSS was denied access to the root.

rule.info: 系统还原事件的分组。
rule.description: Group of system restore events.

rule.info: 跳过为 $(win.eventdata.data) 创建还原点，因为有可用的先前还原点。
rule.description: Skipped creation of restore point for $(win.eventdata.data) as there is a previous restore point available.

rule.info: 创建还原点失败。
rule.description: Failed to create restore point.

rule.info: 成功创建还原点。
rule.description: Restore point successfully created.

rule.info: 启用系统还原。
rule.description: System restore enabled.

rule.info: 成功初始化系统还原。
rule.description: Successfully initialized system restore.

rule.info: 成功恢复系统。
rule.description: Successfully restored system.

rule.info: 已成功创建计划还原点。
rule.description: Successfully created scheduled restore point.

rule.info: 应用程序错误事件组。
rule.description: Group of application error events.

rule.info: 应用程序出错。
rule.description: Application faulted.

rule.info: 故障桶报告。
rule.description: Fault bucket report.

rule.info: WMI事件的分组。
rule.description: Group of WMI events.

rule.info: 无法激活事件过滤器。
rule.description: Event filter could not be activated.

rule.info: 无法初始化 WMI 服务。
rule.description: WMI service could not be initialized.

rule.info: WMI ADAP 无法连接到命名空间。
rule.description: WMI ADAP failed to connect to namespace.

rule.info: 检测到不一致的系统关闭。
rule.description: Inconsistent system shutdown detected.

rule.info: WMI 服务未能加载存储库文件。
rule.description: The WMI service failed to load the repository files.

rule.info: 配额达到警告值，WMI 停止 WMIPRVSE.EXE。
rule.description: A quota reached a warning value, WMI stopped WMIPRVSE.EXE.

rule.info: 尝试加载 MOF 时遇到错误。
rule.description: Error encountered trying to load MOF.

rule.info: 事件提供者试图注册一个语法无效的查询。
rule.description: Event provider attempted to register a syntactically invalid query.

rule.info: 事件提供者试图注册一个内在事件查询。
rule.description: Event provider attempted to register an intrinsic event query.

rule.info: 事件提供者试图注册查询。
rule.description: Event provider attempted to register query.

rule.info: WMI ADAP 无法连接到命名空间。
rule.description: WMI ADAP failed to connect to namespace.

rule.info: WMI ADAP 无法保存对象。
rule.description: WMI ADAP was unable to save object.

rule.info: WMI ADAP 无法创建 Win32_Perf 基类。
rule.description: WMI ADAP was unable to create the Win32_Perf base class.

rule.info: 提供程序已在 WMI 命名空间中注册。
rule.description: The provider has been registered in the WMI namespace.

rule.info: WMI 服务检测到与 WMI 存储库不一致。
rule.description: The WMI service detected an inconsistency with the WMI repository.

rule.info: WMI 服务未能加载存储库文件。
rule.description: The WMI service failed to load the repository files.

rule.info: 拒绝访问命名空间。
rule.description: Access to namespace denied.

rule.info: WMI 服务无法为命名空间异步传递结果。
rule.description: WMI service could not deliver results asynchronously for the namespace.

rule.info: WMI 停止了 WMIRPVSE.EXE，因为配额达到了警告值。
rule.description: WMI stopped WMIPRVSE.EXE because a quota reached a warning value.

rule.info: WMI 服务在服务启动期间无法找到存储库文件。
rule.description: WMI service was unable to locate the repository files during the service startup.

rule.info: WMI 服务启动成功。
rule.description: WMI service started successfully.

rule.info: WMI 核心、提供程序子系统和事件子系统初始化成功。
rule.description: WMI core, provider subsystem and event subsystem initialized successfully.

rule.info: EventSystem 事件的分组。
rule.description: Group of EventSystem events.

rule.info: EventSystem 抑制了 $(win.eventdata.param1) 秒的重复日志条目。
rule.description: EventSystem supressed duplicate log entries for $(win.eventdata.param1) seconds.

rule.info: 事件系统未能为订阅者创建实例。
rule.description: Event system failed to create an instance for the subscriber.

rule.info: 无法触发 EventObjectChange 事件，查询条件包含错误。
rule.description: EventObjectChange event could not be fired, query criteria contains an error.

rule.info: COM+ 事件系统无法触发 EventObjectChange 事件。
rule.description: The COM+ event system could not fire an EventObjectChange event.

rule.info: 无法加载 EventClass 中指定的类型库。
rule.description: The type library specified in EventClass could not be loaded.

rule.info: COM+ 事件系统检测到损坏的 IEventClass 对象。
rule.description: The COM+ event system detected a corrupt IEventClass object.

rule.info: COM+ 事件系统检测到损坏的 IEventSubscription 对象。
rule.description: The COM+ event system detected a corrupt IEventSubscription object.

rule.info: COM+ 事件系统在其内部处理期间检测到错误的返回码。
rule.description: The COM+ event system detected a bad return code during its internal processing.

rule.info: COM+ 事件系统在其内部处理期间检测到意外的空指针。
rule.description: The COM+ event system detected an unexpected null pointer during its internal processing.

rule.info: COM+ 事件系统在其内部处理期间内存不足。
rule.description: The COM+ event system ran out of memory during its internal processing.

rule.info: COM+ 事件系统检测到来自 Win32 API 调用的意外错误。
rule.description: The COM+ event system detected an unexpected error from a Win32 API call.

rule.info: COM+ 事件系统检测到其内部状态不一致。
rule.description: The COM+ event system detected an inconsistency in its internal state.

rule.info: COM+ 事件系统捕捉到异常。
rule.description: The COM+ event system caught an exception.

rule.info: COM+ 事件系统发现访问冲突。
rule.description: The COM+ event system caught an access violation.

rule.info: COM+ 事件系统无法存储每用户订阅。
rule.description: The COM+ event system could not store the per-user subscription.

rule.info: COM+ 事件系统在尝试查询对象时检测到错误，因为条件字符串包含错误。
rule.description: The COM+ event system detected an error trying to query object because the criteria string contained an error.

rule.info: COM+ 事件系统无法移除对象。
rule.description: The COM+ event system could not remove the object.

rule.info: COM+ 事件系统无法封送订阅者进行订阅。
rule.description: The COM+ event system could not marshal the subscriber for subscription.

rule.info: COM+ 事件系统未能创建 MultiInterfacePublisherFilter 的实例。
rule.description: The COM+ event system failed to create an instance of the MultiInterfacePublisherFilter.

rule.info: COM+ 事件系统无法将筛选条件应用于订阅，因为条件字符串包含错误。
rule.description: The COM+ event system could not apply the filter criteria to subscription because the criteria string contained an error.

rule.info: 桌面窗口管理器事件的分组。
rule.description: Group of desktop window manager events.

rule.info: 无法启动桌面窗口管理器。
rule.description: Unable to start desktop window manager.

rule.info: 由于未使用复合主题，无法启动桌面窗口管理器。
rule.description: Unable to start desktop window manager due to composited theme not used.

rule.info: 桌面窗口管理器退出代码 $(win.eventdata.data)。
rule.description: Desktop window manager exited with code $(win.eventdata.data).

rule.info: Winlogon 事件的分组。
rule.description: Group of Winlogon events.

rule.info: $(win.eventdata.data) 无法处理通知事件。
rule.description: $(win.eventdata.data) was unavailable to handle a notification event.

rule.info: $(win.eventdata.data) 无法处理关键通知事件。
rule.description: $(win.eventdata.data) was unavailable to handle a critical notification event.

rule.info: 客户体验改善计划的用户注销通知。
rule.description: User logoff notification for customer experience improvement program.

rule.info: 外壳意外停止。
rule.description: The shell stopped unexpectedly.

rule.info: 应用于登录用户的登录时间限制策略。
rule.description: Logon hours restriction policy applied to the logged on user.

rule.info: 桌面切换失败。
rule.description: Desktop switch failed.

rule.info: Windows 登录过程意外终止。
rule.description: Windows logon process terminated unexpectedly.

rule.info: Windows 登录过程未能断开用户会话。
rule.description: Windows logon process failed to disconnect the user session.

rule.info: Windows 许可证已验证。
rule.description: Windows license validated.

rule.info: 无效的 Windows 许可证。
rule.description: Invalid Windows license.

rule.info: 许可证激活失败。
rule.description: License activation failed.

rule.info: winlogon 通知订阅者失败的通知事件。
rule.description: The winlogon notification subscriber failed a notification event.

rule.info: Winlogon 通知订阅者注册无法加载。
rule.description: Winlogon notification subscriber registration cannot be loaded.

rule.info: winlogon 通知订阅者未能完成关键通知事件。
rule.description: The winlogon notification subscriber failed a critical notification event.

rule.info: Windows 登录进程未能终止当前登录的用户进程。
rule.description: The Windows logon process has failed to terminate currently logged on user's processes.

rule.info: 注册表文件仍在被其他应用程序或服务使用。
rule.description: The registry file is still in use by other applications or services.

rule.info: 用户配置文件事件的分组。
rule.description: Group of user profile events.

rule.info: 无法加载注册表。
rule.description: Unable to load registry.

rule.info: 找不到本地配置文件，使用临时配置文件登录。
rule.description: Cannot find local profile, logging with temporary profile.

rule.info: 在漫游配置文件共享上启用了脱机缓存。
rule.description: Offline caching enabled on the roaming profile share.

rule.info: ESENT事件的分组。
rule.description: Group of ESENT events.

rule.info: 数据库引擎停止了一个实例。
rule.description: The database engine stopped an instance.

rule.info: 数据库引擎分离了一个数据库。
rule.description: The database engine detached a database.

rule.info: 数据库引擎附加了一个数据库。
rule.description: The database engine attached a database.

rule.info: 意外的 Win32 错误。
rule.description: Unexpected Win32 error.

rule.info: 备份被客户端中断或连接失败。
rule.description: The backup was interrupted by the client or the connection failed.

rule.info: 发生同步读取页面校验和错误。
rule.description: Synchronous read page checksum error occurred.

rule.info: 无法读取日志头。
rule.description: Unable to read log header.

rule.info: 数据库引擎已启动。
rule.description: Database engine started.

rule.info: 数据库引擎已停止。
rule.description: Database engine stopped.

rule.info: 数据库引擎正在启动一个新实例。
rule.description: The database engine is starting a new instance.

rule.info: 开始完整备份。
rule.description: Starting full backup.

rule.info: 数据库引擎正在启动恢复步骤。
rule.description: The database engine is initiating recovery steps.

rule.info: 数据库引擎正在重播日志文件 C:\Winnt\system32\wins\j50.log。
rule.description: The database engine is replaying log file C:\Winnt\system32\wins\j50.log.

rule.info: 数据库引擎已完成恢复步骤。
rule.description: The database engine has completed recovery steps.

rule.info: 日志版本戳与数据库引擎版本戳不匹配。
rule.description: Log version stamp does not match database engine version stamp.

rule.info: 数据库引擎无法访问文件。
rule.description: The database engine could not access a file.

rule.info: 无法写入阴影头文件。
rule.description: Unable to write a shadowed header file.

rule.info: 无法读取日志头。
rule.description: Unable to read the log header.

rule.info: 由于页面校验和不匹配，数据库页面读取验证失败。
rule.description: The database page read failed verification due to a page checksum mismatch.

rule.info: 数据库页面读取验证失败。
rule.description: Failed verification for database page read.

rule.info: 尝试打开文件进行只读访问失败，出现系统错误。
rule.description: An attempt to open the file for read only access failed with system error.

rule.info: 已启动数据库的索引清理。
rule.description: Index cleanup of database initiated.

rule.info: 表 ConfigTable 的二级索引 WReplicaSetNameIndex 可能已损坏。
rule.description: The secondary index WReplicaSetNameIndex of table ConfigTable may be corrupt.

rule.info: 此实例的版本存储已达到其最大大小。
rule.description: The version store for this instance has reached its maximum size.

rule.info: 卷影副本 2 冻结已开始。
rule.description: Shadow copy 2 freeze started.

rule.info: 卷影副本 2 冻结已停止。
rule.description: Shadow copy 2 freeze stopped.

rule.info: 卷影复制服务警告：无法执行备份。
rule.description: Volume Shadow Copy Service Warning: Could not perform a backup.

rule.info: 客户体验改善计划数据成功整合。
rule.description: Customer experience improvement program data successfully consolidated.

rule.info: CAPI2事件的分组。
rule.description: Group of CAPI2 events.

rule.info: 第三方根自动更新检索失败。
rule.description: Failed auto update retrieval of third-party root.

rule.info: 从自动更新 cab 中提取第三方根列表失败。
rule.description: Failed extract of third-party root list from auto update cab.

rule.info: 加密服务在处理 Onidentify 调用时失败。
rule.description: Cryptographic services failed while processing the Onidentify call.

rule.info: 第三方根证书自动更新成功。
rule.description: Successful auto update of third-party root certificate.

rule.info: 第三方根列表cab自动更新检索成功。
rule.description: Successful auto update retrieval of third-party root list cab.

rule.info: 第三方根证书自动更新检索成功。
rule.description: Successful auto update retrieval of third-party root certificate.

rule.info: 达到 crypt32 事件阈值。
rule.description: Reached crypt32 threshold of events.

rule.info: 第三方根列表序号自动更新检索成功。
rule.description: Successful auto update retrieval of third-party root list sequence number.

rule.info: 第三方根证书自动删除成功。
rule.description: Successful auto delete of third-party root certificate.

rule.info: 第三方根证书自动属性更新成功。
rule.description: Successful auto property update of third-party root certificate.

rule.info: 加密服务未能初始化目录数据库。
rule.description: The cryptographic services failed to initialize the Catalog Database.

rule.info: 加密服务未能初始化目录数据库。 ESENT 错误。
rule.description: The cryptographic services failed to initialize the Catalog Database. ESENT error.

rule.info: 加密服务未能初始化 VSS 备份“系统编写器”对象。
rule.description: The cryptographic services failed to initialize the VSS backup "System Writer" object.

rule.info: MSDTC事件的分组。
rule.description: Group of MSDTC events.

rule.info: 无法将 MS DTC 错误代码转换为相应的 MS DTC 错误消息。
rule.description: Unable to translate the MS DTC error code to the appropiate MS DTC error message.

rule.info: 管理此系统上的 MS DTC 的权限被拒绝。
rule.description: Permission denied to manage the MS DTC on this system.

rule.info: 处理来自服务控制管理器的控制请求时发生异常。
rule.description: Exception occurred while processing control requests from the service control manager.

rule.info: MS DTC 与本地 DTC 具有相同的唯一标识。
rule.description: The MS DTC has the same unique identity as the local one.

rule.info: MS DTC 事务管理器无法初始化。
rule.description: MS DTC transaction manager could not be initialized.

rule.info: MS DTC 内存不足。
rule.description: MS DTC run out of memory.

rule.info: MS DTC 事务管理器无法初始化。
rule.description: MS DTC transaction manager could not be initialized.

rule.info: 微软分布式事务协调器服务成功移除。
rule.description: Microsoft distributed transaction coordinator service successfully removed.

rule.info: 无法安装 MS DTC 服务。
rule.description: Could not install the MS DTC service.

rule.info: 无法删除 MS DTC 服务。
rule.description: MS DTC service could not be removed.

rule.info: 未找到 MS DTC 日志路径。
rule.description: MS DTC log path not found.

rule.info: 无法加载 MS DTC 事务管理器。
rule.description: MS DTC transaction manager could not be loaded.

rule.info: 无法创建 MS DTC 名称对象。
rule.description: MS DTC name object could not be created.

rule.info: MS DTC 用户界面服务器对象无法初始化。
rule.description: MS DTC user interface server object could not be initialized.

rule.info: 无法加载 MS DTC 用户界面服务器对象。
rule.description: MS DTC user interface server object could not be loaded.

rule.info: MS DTC 用户界面服务器对象不支持请求的界面。
rule.description: MS DTC user interface server object does not support the requested interface.

rule.info: 无法加载 MS DTC 用户界面名称对象。
rule.description: MS DTC user interface name object could not be loaded.

rule.info: 无法加载 MS DTC 日志管理器 DLL。
rule.description: MS DTC log manager DLL could not be loaded.

rule.info: MS DTC 日志文件无法解压缩。
rule.description: MS DTC log file could not be decompressed.

rule.info: MS DTC 日志文件已满，无法接受新的日志记录。
rule.description: MS DTC log file is full and cannot accept new log records.

rule.info: MS DTC 日志文件属性无效。
rule.description: MS DTC log file attributes are invalid.

rule.info: MS DTC 日志文件已包装。
rule.description: MS DTC log file has wrapped.

rule.info: XA 事务管理器试图定位“GetXaSwitch”函数。
rule.description: XA transaction manager attempted to locate the "GetXaSwitch" function.

rule.info: 无法强制交易结果。
rule.description: Could not force transaction outcome.

rule.info: 指定的事务网桥 CLSID 不是有效的 GUID。
rule.description: The specified transaction bridge CLSID is not a valid GUID.

rule.info: 无法强制交易结果。
rule.description: Could not force transaction outcome.

rule.info: 创建事务桥时出错。
rule.description: An error occurred creating the transaction bridge.

rule.info: 初始化事务桥时出错。
rule.description: An error occurred initializing the transaction bridge.

rule.info: 启动事务桥接时发生错误。
rule.description: An error occurred starting the transaction bridge.

rule.info: 一个日志客户端报告了一个检查点。
rule.description: A log client has reported taking a checkpoint.

rule.info: MS DTC 已确定群集服务已配置。
rule.description: MS DTC has determined that the cluster service is configured.

rule.info: 未找到交易。
rule.description: Transaction not found.

rule.info: 该交易不是子交易。
rule.description: The transaction is not a child transaction.

rule.info: MSDTC TM 无法确定传入连接请求是否来自远程计算机。
rule.description: The MSDTC TM could not determine if an incoming connection request is from a remote machine.

rule.info: 事务未提交或仍有资源管理器或从属 MS DTC 事务管理器连接。
rule.description: Either the transaction is not committed or there are resource managers or subordinate MS DTC transaction managers still connected.

rule.info: 由于未知错误，无法解决交易。
rule.description: Could not resolve the transaction due to an unknown error.

rule.info: MS DTC 日志文件不可读。
rule.description: The MS DTC log file is unreadable.

rule.info: MS DTC 遇到内部错误并正在终止。
rule.description: MS DTC encountered an internal error and is terminating.

rule.info: 无法停止 MS DTC 服务或其依赖服务之一。
rule.description: Could not stop the MS DTC service or one of its dependent services.

rule.info: 无效的命令行参数。
rule.description: Invalid command line arguments.

rule.info: MS DTC 日志文件是不兼容的版本。
rule.description: The MS DTC log file is an incompatible version.

rule.info: 未选择事务。
rule.description: No transaction selected.

rule.info: 超过了 MS DTC 日志文件可以容纳的最大活动事务数。
rule.description: Exceeded maximum number of active transactions that the MS DTC log file can accomodate.

rule.info: MS DTC 事务管理器处于不一致的状态，无法继续。
rule.description: MS DTC transaction manager is in an inconsistent state and cannot proceed.

rule.info: MS DTC 事务管理器日志写入失败。
rule.description: MS DTC transaction manager log write failed.

rule.info: MS DTC 事务管理器启动失败。
rule.description: MS DTC transaction manager start failed.

rule.info: 资源管理器执行了恢复。
rule.description: A resource manager performed recovery.

rule.info: 无法创建 MS DTC XA 事务管理器对象。
rule.description: MS DTC XA transaction Manager object could not be created.

rule.info: MS DTC XA 事务管理器无法启动。
rule.description: MS DTC XA transaction manager could not start.

rule.info: 找不到 MS DTC TIP 网关联系人对象。
rule.description: Could not locate the MS DTC TIP gateway contact object.

rule.info: 无法创建 MS DTC TIP 网关初始化对象。
rule.description: MS DTC TIP gateway initialization object could not be created.

rule.info: MS DTC TIP网关初始化失败。
rule.description: MS DTC TIP gateway failed to initialize.

rule.info: MS DTC TIP网关启动失败。
rule.description: MS DTC TIP gateway failed to start.

rule.info: 尝试启动 MS DTC 时无法初始化 COM。
rule.description: Failed to initialize COM while trying to start MS DTC.

rule.info: MS DTC 组件中出现严重错误，进程终止。
rule.description: A critical error occurred in an MS DTC component, process terminating.

rule.info: 未能将调用方提供的 TIP 事务 URL 转换为有效的 MS DTC 事务 ID。
rule.description: Failed to convert the caller provided TIP transaction URL into a valid MS DTC transaction ID.

rule.info: 无法获取 OLE 事务代理的文件名。
rule.description: Unable to get the file name for the OLE transactions proxy.

rule.info: OLE 事务代理 DLL 中缺少 DllGetTransactionManagerCore 函数。
rule.description: The DllGetTransactionManagerCore function is missing from the OLE transactions proxy DLL.

rule.info: 无法连接到远程 MS DTC 事务管理器系统上的注册表。
rule.description: Failed to connect to the registry on the remote MS DTC transaction manager's system.

rule.info: 未能打开包含事务管理器列表的注册表项。
rule.description: Failed to open the registry key containing the list of transaction managers.

rule.info: 无法从注册表中读取默认事务管理器的名称。
rule.description: Failed to read the name of the default transaction manager from the registry.

rule.info: 无法打开包含 OLE 事务代理 DLL 名称的注册表项。
rule.description: Failed to open the registry key containing the name of the OLE transactions proxy DLL.

rule.info: 无法从注册表中读取 OLE 事务代理 DLL 的名称。
rule.description: Failed to read the name of the OLE transactions proxy DLL from the registry.

rule.info: 无法通过 MS DTC 代理 DLL 启动 MS DTC。
rule.description: Failed to start MS DTC via the MS DTC proxy DLL.

rule.info: 无法启动 MS DTC，因为集群支持初始化失败。
rule.description: Unable to start MS DTC because initialization of cluster support failed.

rule.info: MS DTC TIP 网关非法转换。
rule.description: MS DTC TIP gateway illegal transition.

rule.info: MS DTC TIP 网关无效值。
rule.description: MS DTC TIP gateway invalid value.

rule.info: MS DTC TIP 网关在调用 CoCreateInstance 时遇到错误。
rule.description: MS DTC TIP gateway encountered error calling CoCreateInstance.

rule.info: MS DTC 组件无法为关键操作分配内存。
rule.description: An MS DTC component was unable to allocate memory for a critical operation.

rule.info: MS DTC 事务管理器发送了一个提示“ABORT COMMAND”。
rule.description: The MS DTC transaction manager sent a TIP "ABORT COMMAND".

rule.info: MS DTC 事务管理器发送了一个提示“PUSH COMMAND”。
rule.description: The MS DTC transaction manager sent a TIP "PUSH COMMAND".

rule.info: MS DTC 事务管理器发送了一个提示“PREPARE COMMAND”。
rule.description: The MS DTC transaction manager sent a TIP "PREPARE COMMAND".

rule.info: MS DTC 事务管理器发送了一个提示“COMMIT、QUERY 或 RECONNECT COMMAND”。
rule.description: The MS DTC transaction manager sent a TIP "COMMIT, QUERY, or RECONNECT COMMAND".

rule.info: MS DTC 事务管理器收到提示“ERROR COMMAND”。
rule.description: The MS DTC transaction manager received a TIP "ERROR COMMAND".

rule.info: MS DTC 事务管理器收到一个未知或意外的活动事务的 TIP 命令。
rule.description: The MS DTC transaction manager received an unknown or unexpected TIP command for an active transaction.

rule.info: MS DTC 事务管理器收到“Prepared”事务的提示“ERROR COMMAND”。
rule.description: The MS DTC transaction manager received a TIP "ERROR COMMAND" for a "Prepared" transaction.

rule.info: MS DTC 事务管理器收到“Prepared”事务的意外或未知 TIP 命令。
rule.description: The MS DTC transaction manager received an unexpected or unknown TIP command for a "Prepared" transaction.

rule.info: 无法初始化 MS DTC 通信管理器。
rule.description: Failed to initialize the MS DTC Communication Manager.

rule.info: MS DTC 无法与远程系统上的 MS DTC 通信。
rule.description: MS DTC is unable to communicate with MS DTC on a remote system.

rule.info: MS DTC 连接管理器无法向 RPC 注册以使用 TCP/IP 或 UDP/IP。
rule.description: The MS DTC connection manager is unable to register with RPC to use TCP/IP or UDP/IP.

rule.info: MS DTC 无法与远程系统上的 MS DTC 通信。
rule.description: MS DTC is unable to communicate with MS DTC on a remote system.

rule.info: MS DTC 无法分配控制台。
rule.description: MS DTC was not able to allocate a console.

rule.info: 检测到未完全初始化的 MS DTC 日志文件。
rule.description: An incompletely initialized MS DTC log file was detected.

rule.info: 非法转换导致致命错误。
rule.description: Illegal transition caused fatal error.

rule.info: 内存不足导致致命错误。
rule.description: Out of memory caused fatal error.

rule.info: 同步对象上发生意外事件。
rule.description: Unexpected event occurred on synchronization object.

rule.info: MS DTC XA 事务管理器中发生意外错误。
rule.description: Unexpected error occurred in the MS DTC XA transaction manager.

rule.info: MS DTC 无法绑定到 TIP 套接字。
rule.description: MS DTC was unable to bind to the TIP socket.

rule.info: MS DTC 事务管理器向另一个事务管理器发送了一个提示“PULL COMMAND”。
rule.description: The MS DTC transaction manager sent a TIP "PULL COMMAND" to another transaction manager.

rule.info: MS DTC 事务管理器收到活动事务的提示“ERROR COMMAND”。
rule.description: The MS DTC transaction manager received a TIP "ERROR COMMAND" for an active transaction.

rule.info: MS DTC 事务管理器收到一个未知或意外的活动事务的 TIP 命令。
rule.description: The MS DTC transaction manager received an unknown or unexpected TIP command for an active transaction.

rule.info: MS DTC 的现有群集资源配置不正确。
rule.description: The existing cluster resource for MS DTC is not configured correctly.

rule.info: MS DTC 的现有群集资源是较新版本。
rule.description: The existing cluster resource for MS DTC is of a newer version.

rule.info: 在此节点上安装 MS DTC 曾经是安装了更新版本的 MS DTC 的集群的一部分。
rule.description: The installation of MS DTC on this node used to be a part of cluster that had a newer version of MS DTC installed.

rule.info: MS DTC 无法确定与本地注册表中的群集支持相关的数据版本。
rule.description: MS DTC was unable to determine the version of the data associated with cluster support in the local registry.

rule.info: MS DTC 无法启动，因为它未能在集群安装后初始化日志文件以供其首次使用。
rule.description: MS DTC cannot start because it failed to initialize the log file for its first usage after a cluster install.

rule.info: 无法建立连接以跟踪事务。
rule.description: Could not establish connection to trace transaction.

rule.info: 未选择事务。
rule.description: No transaction is selected.

rule.info: 未发现事务。
rule.description: Transaction not found.

rule.info: 事务管理器的版本与此功能不兼容。
rule.description: The version of the transaction manager is not compatible for this feature.

rule.info: 尝试将事务转储到跟踪文件失败。
rule.description: The attempt to dump the transaction to a trace file failed.

rule.info: 跟踪基础设施的初始化失败。
rule.description: The initialization of the tracing infrastructure failed.

rule.info: 尝试创建新的跟踪会话失败。
rule.description: The attempt to create a new trace session failed.

rule.info: 尝试停止现有跟踪会话失败。
rule.description: The attempt to stop the existing trace session failed.

rule.info: 尝试刷新现有跟踪数据失败。
rule.description: The attempt to flush the existing trace data failed.

rule.info: 尝试更新现有跟踪会话的最大缓冲区计数失败。
rule.description: The attempt to update the maximum buffer count of the existing trace session failed.

rule.info: 基础设施报告到目前为止丢失的跟踪事件数等于 $(win.eventdata.data)。
rule.description: The infrastructure has reported that the number of trace events that have been lost until now is equal to $(win.eventdata.data).

rule.info: 为更新跟踪设置而启动的线程失败。
rule.description: The thread launched to update the trace settings has failed.

rule.info: 尝试设置跟踪特定的注册表设置失败。
rule.description: The attempt to set the trace specific registry settings failed.

rule.info: 未能创建新的跟踪会话。
rule.description: Failed to create a new trace session.

rule.info: 未能停止现存的跟踪会话。
rule.description: Failed to stop the existing trace session.

rule.info: 未能刷新现存的跟踪会话。
rule.description: Failed to flush the existing trace data.

rule.info: 无法更新现有跟踪会话的最大缓冲区计数。
rule.description: Failed to update the maximum buffer count of the existing trace session.

rule.info: 未能更新注册表中的所有跟踪设置。
rule.description: Failed to update all the trace settings in the registry.

rule.info: 无法从注册表加载所有跟踪设置。
rule.description: Failed to load all the trace settings from the registry.

rule.info: MS DTC 事务管理器启动失败。
rule.description: MS DTC transaction manager start failed.

rule.info: MS DTC 未能加载系统还原信息。
rule.description: MS DTC failed to load the system restore information.

rule.info: MS DTC 无法处理系统还原事件。
rule.description: MS DTC failed to process a system restore event.

rule.info: MS DTC 未能保存系统还原信息。
rule.description: MS DTC failed to save the system restore information.

rule.info: MS DTC 已处理系统还原事件。
rule.description: MS DTC has processed a system restore event.

rule.info: 基础架构报告，由于缺少足够的缓冲区空间，尝试跟踪事件失败。
rule.description: The infrastructure has reported that an attempt to trace an event has failed cause of lack of enough buffer space.

rule.info: 无法从注册表中读取所需的名称对象。
rule.description: Failed to read the needed name objects from the registry.

rule.info: 无法初始化所需的名称对象。
rule.description: Failed to initialize the needed name objects.

rule.info: 未能停止 MSDTC 服务或其依赖服务之一。
rule.description: Failed to stop MSDTC service or one of its dependent services.

rule.info: 未能在 MS DTC 服务上设置安全属性。
rule.description: Failed to set the security attributes on the MS DTC service.

rule.info: 无法停止 MS DTC 服务。
rule.description: Failed to stop the MS DTC service.

rule.info: 无法重新启动 MS DTC 服务。
rule.description: Failed to restart the MS DTC service.

rule.info: MS DTC 事务管理器处于不一致状态，无法继续。
rule.description: The MS DTC transaction manager is in an inconsistent state and cannot proceed.

rule.info: 运行 MS DTC 的帐户无效。
rule.description: The account that the MS DTC is running under is invalid.

rule.info: 在注册表中设置 MS DTC 服务帐户信息失败。
rule.description: Failed to set the MS DTC service account information in the registry.

rule.info: MS DTC 服务正在终止，因为它没有及时启动。
rule.description: The MS DTC Service is terminating because it didn't startup in a timely manner.

rule.info: MS DTC 组件遇到内部错误。
rule.description: A MS DTC component has encountered an internal error.

rule.info: MS DTC 无法启动，因为此版本的 dtc 低于允许的最低有效版本。
rule.description: MS DTC was unable to start because this version of dtc is less than the least valid version allowable.

rule.info: MS DTC 无法启动，因为此版本的 dtc 与安装在群集的另一个节点上的 MS DTC 版本不兼容。
rule.description: MS DTC was unable to start because this version of dtc is not compatible with the version of MS DTC installed on another node of the cluster.

rule.info: XA 事务管理器处于不一致状态，无法继续。
rule.description: The XA transaction manager is in an inconsistent state and cannot proceed.

rule.info: 输入 MSDTC 日志存储警告限制。
rule.description: Entering MSDTC log storage warning limits.

rule.info: 离开 MSDTC 日志存储警告限制。
rule.description: Leaving MSDTC log storage warning limits.

rule.info: KTMRM 服务加载系统还原信息失败。
rule.description: KTMRM service failed to load the system restore information.

rule.info: 尝试冻结事务管理器失败。
rule.description: Attempt to freeze the transaction manager failed.

rule.info: 尝试解冻事务管理器失败。
rule.description: Attempt to thaw the transaction manager failed.

rule.info: 无法准备 MSDTC 进行成像。
rule.description: Failed to prepare MSDTC for imaging.

rule.info: 连接到内核事务管理器时出现意外错误。
rule.description: Unexpected error when connecting to the kernel transaction manager.

rule.info: 无法创建用于内核事务管理器的通信通道。
rule.description: Unable to create a communication channel to the kernel transaction manager.

rule.info: MSDTC 在 Windows 升级期间无法迁移其日志。
rule.description: MSDTC was unable to migrate its log during Windows upgrade.

rule.info: MSDTC 在迁移联系人标识符期间遇到错误。
rule.description: MSDTC encountered an error during migration of contact identifiers.

rule.info: MSDTC 在 Windows 升级期间遇到错误。
rule.description: MSDTC encountered an error during Windows upgrade.

rule.info: 已超过最大异步检查点数。
rule.description: The maximum number of asynchronous checkpoints has been exceeded.

rule.info: 已达到使用的最大日志缓冲区数。
rule.description: The maximum number of log buffers in use has been reached.

rule.info: MS DTC 在恢复时检测到脏日志页面，并且正在从其他页面重建状态。
rule.description: MS DTC detected dirty log pages on recovery, and is reconstructing state from other pages.

rule.info: 收到未知的连接管理器消息类型。
rule.description: Received unknown connection manager message type.

rule.info: MS DTC XA 事务管理器调用了 XA 资源管理器的 xa_commit 函数。
rule.description: The MS DTC XA transaction manager called the XA resource manager's xa_commit function.

rule.info: MS DTC XA 事务管理器调用了 XA 资源管理器的 xa_open 函数。
rule.description: The MS DTC XA transaction manager called the XA resource manager's xa_open function.

rule.info: DTC 参数值信息。
rule.description: DTC parameter values information.

rule.info: XA 事务管理器试图加载 XA 资源管理器 DLL。
rule.description: The XA transaction manager attempted to load the XA resource manager DLL.

rule.info: XA 事务管理器试图在 XA 资源管理器 DLL 中定位“GetXaSwitch”函数。
rule.description: The XA transaction manager attempted to locate the "GetXaSwitch" function in the XA resource manager DLL.

rule.info: MS DTC 事务结果未预料到。
rule.description: MS DTC transaction outcome is unexpected.

rule.info: MS DTC XA 事务管理器无法执行恢复。
rule.description: The MS DTC XA transaction manager was unable to perform recovery.

rule.info: 启发式损坏信息。
rule.description: Heuristic damage information.

rule.info: XA 事务管理器尝试使用 XA 资源管理器执行恢复。
rule.description: The XA transaction manager attempted to perform recovery with the XA resource manager.

rule.info: XA 事务管理器调用了 XA 资源管理器的 xa_open 函数。
rule.description: The XA transaction manager called the XA resource manager's xa_open function.

rule.info: XA 事务管理器调用了 XA 资源管理器的 xa_close 函数。
rule.description: The XA transaction manager called the XA resource manager's xa_close function.

rule.info: MS DTC XA 事务管理器调用了 XA 资源管理器的 xa_recover 函数。
rule.description: The MS DTC XA transaction manager called the XA resource manager's xa_recover function.

rule.info: MS DTC XA 事务管理器调用了 XA 资源管理器的 xa_commit 函数。
rule.description: The MS DTC XA transaction manager called the XA resource manager's xa_commit function.

rule.info: MS DTC XA 事务管理器调用了 XA 资源管理器的 xa_rollback 函数。
rule.description: The MS DTC XA transaction manager called the XA resource manager's xa_rollback function.

rule.info: MS DTC XA 事务管理器调用了 XA 资源管理器的 xa_prepare 函数。
rule.description: The MS DTC XA transaction manager called the XA resource manager's xa_prepare function.

rule.info: XA 事务管理器在 XA 资源管理器 DLL 中调用了“GetXaSwitch”函数。
rule.description: The XA transaction manager called the "GetXaSwitch" function in the XA resource manager DLL.

rule.info: MS DTC XA 事务管理器无法代表 XA 资源管理器向 MS DTC 事务管理器注册。
rule.description: The MS DTC XA transaction manager could not enroll with the MS DTC transaction manager on behalf of the XA resource manager.

rule.info: MS DTC XA 事务管理器调用了 XA 资源管理器的 xa_commit 函数。
rule.description: The MS DTC XA transaction manager called the XA resource manager's xa_commit function.

rule.info: MS DTC XA 事务管理器调用了 XA 资源管理器的 xa_rollback 函数。
rule.description: The MS DTC XA transaction manager called the XA resource manager's xa_rollback function.

rule.info: MS DTC XA 事务管理器调用了 XA 资源管理器的 xa_prepare 函数。
rule.description: The MS DTC XA transaction manager called the XA resource manager's xa_prepare function.

rule.info: MS DTC XA 事务管理器调用 XA 资源管理器的 xa_commit 函数并设置了 TMONEPHASE 标志。
rule.description: The MS DTC XA transaction manager called the XA resource manager's xa_commit function with the TMONEPHASE flag set.

rule.info: XaTmMinWarmRecoveryInterval 的值大于 XaTmMaxWarmRecoveryInterval 的值。
rule.description: The value of XaTmMinWarmRecoveryInterval is greater than the value of XaTmMaxWarmRecoveryInterval.

rule.info: 在 MS DTC 安装期间，尝试保留旧日志文件失败。
rule.description: During MS DTC installation, the attempt to preserve the old log file failed.

rule.info: MS DTC 收到无效消息。
rule.description: MS DTC has received an invalid message.

rule.info: MS DTC 组件中的连接管理器收到无效消息。
rule.description: The connection manager in a MS DTC component has received an invalid message.

rule.info: MS DTC XA 事务管理器尝试解密日志记录中的信息失败。
rule.description: The MS DTC XA transaction manager failed attempting to decrypt information in a log record.

rule.info: KtmRm 收到无效消息。
rule.description: KtmRm has received an invalid message.

rule.info: .NET 运行事件的分组。
rule.description: Group of .NET runtime events.

rule.info: 进程因未处理的异常而终止。
rule.description: The process was terminated due to an unhandled exception.

rule.info: 找不到源 .NET 运行时中事件 ID 0 的描述。
rule.description: The description for event ID 0 in source .NET runtime cannot be found.

rule.info: .NET 运行时加载失败。
rule.description: .NET Runtime failed to load.

rule.info: .NET 运行时 - CLR 2.0 不支持为 CLR 1.x 编写的分析器。
rule.description: .NET Runtime - CLR 2.0 does not support profilers written for CLR 1.x.

rule.info: .NET 运行时 - 致命的执行引擎错误。
rule.description: .NET Runtime - Fatal execution engine error.

rule.info: Windows 位置提供程序数据库出错。
rule.description: There was an error with the Windows location provider database.

rule.info: Windows 位置提供程序已启动。
rule.description: Windows location provider started.

rule.info: Windows 位置提供程序已关闭。
rule.description: The Windows location provider has shutdown.

rule.info: 进程 $(win.eventdata.processPath) 已将策略方案从 $(win.eventdata.oldSchemeGuid) 重置为 $(win.eventdata.newSchemeGuid)。
rule.description: Process $(win.eventdata.processPath) has reset policy scheme from $(win.eventdata.oldSchemeGuid) to $(win.eventdata.newSchemeGuid).

rule.info: 应用程序管理事件组。
rule.description: Group of application management events.

rule.info: 申请分配失败。
rule.description: Assignment of application failed.

rule.info: 从策略中删除应用程序的分配失败。
rule.description: The removal of the assignment of application from policy failed.

rule.info: 应用程序被配置为升级另一个应用程序。
rule.description: Application was configured to upgrade another application.

rule.info: 应用程序的安装程序执行失败。
rule.description: The execution of the setup program for an application failed.

rule.info: 未能将更改应用到软件安装设置。
rule.description: Failed to apply changes to software installation settings.

rule.info: 申请分配成功。
rule.description: The assignment of an application succeeded.

rule.info: 已成功删除应用程序的分配。
rule.description: The removal of the assignment of an application succeeded.

rule.info: 程序的 setup 命令启动成功。
rule.description: The launch of the setup command for a program succeeded.

rule.info: DNS 客户端服务无法联系任何 DNS 服务器进行重复尝试。
rule.description: The DNS client service could not contact any DNS servers for a repeated number of attempts.

rule.info: 磁盘事件的分组。
rule.description: Group of disk events.

rule.info: 设备有坏的块。
rule.description: A device has a bad block.

rule.info: 设备在超时期限内没有响应。
rule.description: A device did not respond within the timeout period.

rule.info: 驱动程序检测到控制器错误。
rule.description: The driver detected a controller error.

rule.info: 缺少配置信息中列出的条带集或卷集成员。
rule.description: A stripe set or volume set member listed in the configuration information was missing.

rule.info: 容错驱动程序配置信息已损坏。
rule.description: The fault tolerance driver configuration information is corrupted.

rule.info: 无法使用包含 \Device\MissingMirror1Member0 的 FT 集。
rule.description: The FT set containing \Device\MissingMirror1Member0 cannot be used.

rule.info: 镜像初始化或同步开始。
rule.description: Mirror initialization or synchronization started.

rule.info: VDS 无法启动提供程序。
rule.description: VDS fails to launch provider.

rule.info: 镜像初始化失败。
rule.description: Initialization of mirror failed.

rule.info: DCOM 错误。
rule.description: DCOM error.

rule.info: 驱动器 c 的 diskeeper 碎片整理已停止：。
rule.description: The diskeeper defragmentation has stopped for drive c:.

rule.info: 容错驱动程序检测到系统已脏关闭。
rule.description: The fault tolerant driver detected the system was shutdown dirty.

rule.info: 驱动程序检测到设备 \Device\Harddisk2\DR2 已启用其写入缓存。
rule.description: The driver detected that the device \Device\Harddisk2\DR2 has its write cache enabled.

rule.info: 使用设备 \device\harddisk0\partition2 上的纠错码恢复数据。
rule.description: Data was recovered using error correction code on device \device\harddisk0\partition2.

rule.info: 驱动程序禁用了设备上的写入缓存。
rule.description: The driver disabled the write cache on a device.

rule.info: 磁盘上的文件系统结构已损坏且无法使用。
rule.description: The file system structure on the disk is corrupt and unusable.

rule.info: 在应用程序日志中创建的事件。
rule.description: Event created in the application log.

rule.info: EventCollector 事件的分组。
rule.description: Group of EventCollector events.

rule.info: 由于通信错误，无法在目标计算机上激活订阅。
rule.description: The subscription could not be activated on target machine due to communication error.

rule.info: 订阅已过期，将不再提供服务。
rule.description: The subscription has expired and will no longer be serviced.

rule.info: 订阅无法将事件从目标机器发布到此订阅的日志文件。
rule.description: The subscription could not publish events from target machine to the log file of this subscription.

rule.info: 来自目标机器的事件丢失并且无法传递。
rule.description: An event from target machine is lost and could not be delivered.

rule.info: 订阅检测丢弃的事件。
rule.description: The subscription detects dropped events.

rule.info: 服务远程访问的打开过程失败。
rule.description: The open procedure for service remote access failed.

rule.info: 多个 Windows 错误应用程序事件。
rule.description: Multiple Windows error application events.

rule.info: 多个 Windows 警告应用程序事件。
rule.description: Multiple Windows warning application events.

rule.info: Microsoft-Windows-SoftwareRestrictionPolicies 事件的分组。
rule.description: Group of Microsoft-Windows-SoftwareRestrictionPolicies events.

rule.info: 默认软件限制策略级别由您的管理员限制访问。
rule.description: Access restricted by your administrator by the default software restriction policy level.

rule.info: 管理员使用策略规则按位置限制访问。
rule.description: Access restricted by your administrator by location with policy rule .

rule.info: 软件发布者政策限制您的管理员访问。
rule.description: Access restricted by your administrator by software publisher policy.

rule.info: 您的管理员通过策略规则限制访问。
rule.description: Access restricted by your administrator by policy rule.

rule.info: 您的管理员通过策略规则限制访问。
rule.description: Access restricted by your administrator by policy rule.

rule.info: Windows 应用程序审核失败事件。
rule.description: Windows application audit failure event.

rule.info: Windows 应用程序审核成功事件。
rule.description: Windows application audit success event.

rule.info: MS SQL 服务器登录失败。
rule.description: MS SQL server logon failure.

rule.info: MS SQL 服务器登录成功。
rule.description: MS SQL server logon success.
